description:
DaiEchidnaTest.burn(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#49-56) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(dai.balanceOf(alice) == sub(aliceBalance,wad)) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#54)

DaiEchidnaTest.burn(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#49-56) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- aliceBalance == 0 (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#52)

DaiEchidnaTest.mint(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#39-46) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(dai.balanceOf(alice) == add(aliceBalance,wad)) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#44)

DaiEchidnaTest.transfer(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#59-66) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(dai.balanceOf(address(this)) == sub(thisBalance,wad)) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#64)

DaiEchidnaTest.transfer(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#59-66) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(dai.balanceOf(alice) == add(aliceBalance,wad)) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#65)

DaiEchidnaTest.transfer(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#59-66) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- thisBalance == 0 (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#62)

DaiEchidnaTest.transferFrom(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#69-76) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(dai.balanceOf(alice) == sub(aliceBalance,wad)) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#74)

DaiEchidnaTest.transferFrom(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#69-76) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(dai.balanceOf(address(this)) == add(thisBalance,wad)) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#75)

DaiEchidnaTest.transferFrom(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#69-76) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- aliceBalance == 0 (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#72)
BadSpell.someVar (contracts/test/BadSpell.sol#6) should be constant

	- TokenLike(l1Token).transferFrom(l1Escrow,to,amount) (contracts/l1/L1DaiGateway.sol#155)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- WithdrawalFinalized(l1Token,from,to,exitNum,amount) (contracts/l1/L1DaiGateway.sol#157)

description:
Reentrancy in L1DaiGateway.outboundTransfer(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256,bytes) (contracts/l1/L1DaiGateway.sol#85-122):
	External calls:
	- TokenLike(l1Token).transferFrom(from,l1Escrow,amount) (contracts/l1/L1DaiGateway.sol#106)
	- seqNum = sendTxToL2(l2Counterpart,from,maxSubmissionCost,maxGas,gasPriceBid,outboundCalldata) (contracts/l1/L1DaiGateway.sol#109-116)
		- seqNum = inbox.createRetryableTicket{value: msg.value}(target,0,maxSubmissionCost,user,user,maxGas,gasPriceBid,data) (contracts/l1/L1CrossDomainEnabled.sol#50-59)
	External calls sending eth:
	- seqNum = sendTxToL2(l2Counterpart,from,maxSubmissionCost,maxGas,gasPriceBid,outboundCalldata) (contracts/l1/L1DaiGateway.sol#109-116)
		- seqNum = inbox.createRetryableTicket{value: msg.value}(target,0,maxSubmissionCost,user,user,maxGas,gasPriceBid,data) (contracts/l1/L1CrossDomainEnabled.sol#50-59)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- DepositInitiated(l1Token,from,to,seqNum,amount) (contracts/l1/L1DaiGateway.sol#119)
	- TxToL2(user,target,seqNum,data) (contracts/l1/L1CrossDomainEnabled.sol#60)
		- seqNum = sendTxToL2(l2Counterpart,from,maxSubmissionCost,maxGas,gasPriceBid,outboundCalldata) (contracts/l1/L1DaiGateway.sol#109-116)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [L1DaiGateway.outboundTransfer(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256,bytes)](contracts/l1/L1DaiGateway.sol#L85-L122):
	External calls:
	- [TokenLike(l1Token).transferFrom(from,l1Escrow,amount)](contracts/l1/L1DaiGateway.sol#L106)
	- [seqNum = sendTxToL2(l2Counterpart,from,maxSubmissionCost,maxGas,gasPriceBid,outboundCalldata)](contracts/l1/L1DaiGateway.sol#L109-L116)
		- [seqNum = inbox.createRetryableTicket{value: msg.value}(target,0,maxSubmissionCost,user,user,maxGas,gasPriceBid,data)](contracts/l1/L1CrossDomainEnabled.sol#L50-L59)
	External calls sending eth:
	- [seqNum = sendTxToL2(l2Counterpart,from,maxSubmissionCost,maxGas,gasPriceBid,outboundCalldata)](contracts/l1/L1DaiGateway.sol#L109-L116)
		- [seqNum = inbox.createRetryableTicket{value: msg.value}(target,0,maxSubmissionCost,user,user,maxGas,gasPriceBid,data)](contracts/l1/L1CrossDomainEnabled.sol#L50-L59)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [DepositInitiated(l1Token,from,to,seqNum,amount)](contracts/l1/L1DaiGateway.sol#L119)
	- [TxToL2(user,target,seqNum,data)](contracts/l1/L1CrossDomainEnabled.sol#L60)
		- [seqNum = sendTxToL2(l2Counterpart,from,maxSubmissionCost,maxGas,gasPriceBid,outboundCalldata)](contracts/l1/L1DaiGateway.sol#L109-L116)

description:
Reentrancy in L2DaiGateway.outboundTransfer(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256,bytes) (contracts/l2/L2DaiGateway.sol#88-111):
	External calls:
	- Mintable(l2Dai).burn(from,amount) (contracts/l2/L2DaiGateway.sol#102)
	- id = sendTxToL1(from,l1Counterpart,res) (contracts/l2/L2DaiGateway.sol#106)
		- id = ArbSys(address(100)).sendTxToL1(to,data) (contracts/l2/L2CrossDomainEnabled.sol#29)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- TxToL1(user,to,id,data) (contracts/l2/L2CrossDomainEnabled.sol#31)
		- id = sendTxToL1(from,l1Counterpart,res) (contracts/l2/L2DaiGateway.sol#106)
	- WithdrawalInitiated(l1Token,from,to,id,0,amount) (contracts/l2/L2DaiGateway.sol#109)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [L2DaiGateway.outboundTransfer(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256,bytes)](contracts/l2/L2DaiGateway.sol#L88-L111):
	External calls:
	- [Mintable(l2Dai).burn(from,amount)](contracts/l2/L2DaiGateway.sol#L102)
	- [id = sendTxToL1(from,l1Counterpart,res)](contracts/l2/L2DaiGateway.sol#L106)
		- [id = ArbSys(address(100)).sendTxToL1(to,data)](contracts/l2/L2CrossDomainEnabled.sol#L29)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [TxToL1(user,to,id,data)](contracts/l2/L2CrossDomainEnabled.sol#L31)
		- [id = sendTxToL1(from,l1Counterpart,res)](contracts/l2/L2DaiGateway.sol#L106)
	- [WithdrawalInitiated(l1Token,from,to,id,0,amount)](contracts/l2/L2DaiGateway.sol#L109)
